fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit one player. If they're the Imposter(241), all visitors will learn their role.
- During sabotages, you can instead perform a task specified by the host to end the sabotage, instead of playing the minigame.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If nobody visits the imposter when you visit them, well you end the night immediately with you dying, and a random sabotage occurring.
- Can only spawn with Imposter(241).
- Cannot be any form of sleeper agent
- Conversion immune
